document_data.caption: A map showing Halabar in central Halruaa.
document_data.name: Halabar
document_data.mainbody: '''Halabar''' was a small town located in the nation of [[Halruaa]] during the 14{{th}} century [[DR]].{{Cite interactive atlas|B2aNEIc}}
document_data.Geography: Halabar was located on the plains of central Halruaa north of [[Lake Halruaa]]. Halabar was situated due west of the [[River Aluar]].
